meanings.definition: The quality or state of being dwarfish in size or stature.
meanings.sent1: Her dwarfishness made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The dwarfishness of the toy made it perfect for small hands.
meanings.sent3: The dwarfishness of the puppy made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The dwarfishness of the bonsai tree was enchanting.
meanings.sent5: The dwarfishness of the cabin added to its charm.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of resembling or relating to a dwarf in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The costume designer captured the dwarfishness of the character perfectly.
meanings.sent2: His dwarfishness in the play brought laughter to the audience.
meanings.sent3: The dwarfishness of the garden gnome was quite endearing.
meanings.sent4: Her dwarfishness in personality was surprisingly powerful.
meanings.sent5: The dwarfishness of the statue was striking against the backdrop.
